title: Diabetic ghoulish fairy cakes
ingredients: ['For the cream cheese icing', '2 tablespoons, double cream', '100g low fat cream cheese', '100g low fat yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 to 2 drops orange food colouring', '1 to 2 drops green food colouring', 'For the cakes', '110g butter', '110g cream cheese', '2 tablespoons agave nectar', '5 eggs', '150g almond flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
